attributes.action: Stop Islam4UK protesting in Wootton Bassett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Islam4uk are planning an anti-war march in wootton bassett, i think this is highly offensive, a slap in the face to all our brave forces members who are fighting for democracy and freedom. i also think the choice of venue has been chosen to create the most publisity they can. please put a stop to this march

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
